senses.sense_definition: A type of cathode ray tube that uses a layer of scotophor instead of phosphor on its screen, creating a dark image on a light background rather than emitting light.

examples.text: The vintage radar system employed a <w>skiatron</w> to display tracking data as dark traces that remained visible for some time.
Engineers chose a <w>skiatron</w> tube for the display because it allowed the image to be projected onto a larger screen.
